languages.text: "Дом Орселлио никогда бы не присягнул тако{mf|му|й}, как ты! Мы следуем за светом Его, а ты... ты есть само воплощение хаоса и разврата..."
"House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."
languages.original_text: "Дом Орселлио никогда бы не присягнул тако{mf|му|й}, как ты! Мы следуем за светом Его, а ты... ты есть само воплощение хаоса и разврата..."

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are chaos and debauchery incarnate..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡La casa Orsellio nunca juraría lealtad a alguien así! Seguimos la luz del Emperador y usted... tú eres la encarnación del Caos...».
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."

traits.locale_text: «¡La casa Orsellio nunca juraría lealtad a alguien así! Seguimos la luz del Emperador y usted... tú eres la encarnación del Caos...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « La maison Orsellio ne prêterait jamais allégeance à quelqu'un comme vous ! Nous suivons Sa lumière, tandis que vous... vous êtes l'incarnation du chaos... »
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Orsellio ne prêterait jamais allégeance à quelqu'un comme vous ! Nous suivons Sa lumière, tandis que vous... vous êtes l'incarnation du chaos... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家はあなたのような人に決して忠誠は誓いません！あたくしたちが従うのは主の光。そしてあなた…あなたは歪んだ渾沌の具現…」
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家はあなたのような人に決して忠誠は誓いません！あたくしたちが従うのは主の光。そしてあなた…あなたは歪んだ渾沌の具現…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “奥赛罗家族绝对不会效忠于你这样的人！我们追随的是帝皇的光芒，而你……你却是扭曲与混沌的化身……”
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."

traits.locale_text: “奥塞罗家族绝对不会效忠于你这样的人！我们追随的是帝皇的光芒，而你……你却是扭曲与混沌的化身……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das Haus Orsellio würde niemals jemandem wie Euch die Treue schwören! Wir folgen seinem Licht, und Ihr ... Ihr seid das fleischgewordene Chaos ..."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Orsellio würde niemals jemandem wie Euch die Treue schwören! Wir folgen seinem Licht, und Ihr ... Ihr seid das fleischgewordene Chaos ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi senin gibi birine asla bağlılık yemini etmez! Biz, O'nun ışığını takip ederiz. Sense çarpık kaosun vücut bulmuş hâlisin..."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio would never swear allegiance to someone like you! We follow His light, and you... you are twisted chaos incarnate..."
